headline: Advanced Sterilization Products (ASP) Announces CE Mark for ULTRA GI™ Cycle for Duodenoscopes in Partnership with FUJIFILM Healthcare Europe
summary: ASP GmbH ("ASP"), a division of Fortive (NYSE: FTV), in collaboration with FUJIFILM Healthcare Europe GmbH, proudly announces that the ULTRA GI™ Cycle has received CE mark approval. The ULTRA GI™ Cycle is the latest innovation for the STERRAD™ 100NX Sterilizer with ALLClear™ Technology.
